title: Correction to Conversions between gas-phase metallicities in MaNGA
authors:
Jillian M. Scudder, Sara L. Ellison, Loubna El Meddah El Idrissi,
  Henry Poetrodjojo
abstract:
We present a brief correction to Scudder et al. (2021) due to an error in the
O3N2 based metallicity calibrations presented in that work. Conclusions are
unchanged, but metallicity values shift by $\sim$0.03 dex, with polynomials for
affected conversions shifted by the same amount. We present updated materials
here.
